remarks: Alternate deduction version of ~ fvmpt , suitable for iteration. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Jan-2017.)
statement:
fvmptdf.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. D ) $.
fvmptdf.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x = A ) -> B e. V ) $.
fvmptdf.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x = A ) -> ( ( F ` A ) = B -> ps ) ) $.
fvmptdf.4 $e |- F/_ x F $.
fvmptdf.5 $e |- F/ x ps $.
fvmptdf $p |- ( ph -> ( F = ( x e. D |-> B ) -> ps ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d D x $.
$d ph x $.
